description: Googles new Night Sight mode for Pixel phones lets you capture low-light photos you wouldn't be able to otherwise. It collects data from your subtle hand shakes, instead of just taking a super long exposure, to fill in details that would be lost. Its a huge, game-changing improvement for low-light photography. Now that its available, Dieter Bohn took it to the streets to see what Night Sight is capable of.
